question: I know many people may think this is a dumb question but I have had it on my mind for quite some time now and would like to get it answered.  I don't have Diabetes but am currently going out with a girl who has Type one diabetes.  I am not thoughly educated with diabetes and its causes but I was wondering if I decide to have sex with her am I at risk of getting diabetes as well or any other risks to my health?  Thank You very much for your time to answer my question.
title: Diabetes and STDS
